mapper.insert: insert into tbl_item (item_id, category, item_name, item_price, description, item_stock, item_sold) values(seq_item.nextval,#{category},#{item_name},#{item_price},#{description},#{item_stock},#{item_sold})
mapper.update: update tbl_item set category=#{category}, item_name=#{item_name}, item_price=#{item_price}, item_stock=#{item_stock}, item_sold=#{item_sold}, description=#{description} where item_id=#{item_id}
mapper.select: select item_price from tbl_item where item_id=#{item_id}
select * from tbl_item where item_price between #{start} and #{end}
select * from tbl_item where item_id >0 and item_name like '%' || #{search} || '%'
select item_id, item_name from tbl_item where item_id = #{item_id}

choose.when: select * from ( select * from tbl_item order by update_date desc ) where rownum <= 10
choose.otherwise: select * from ( select * from tbl_item order by item_sold desc ) where rownum <= 10

mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rn, item_id, item_name (select category from tbl_item where tbl_item.category = tbl_item.category) as category from tbl_item where rn < 9
